text: Why am I doing this thing? Well, it's a long story, but to shorten it
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: up: first-time novelists have a tough row to hoe. Our publishers don't
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: have a lot of promotional budget to throw at unknown factors like us.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Mostly, we rise and fall based on word-of-mouth. I'm not bad at word-of-
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: mouth. I have a blog, Boing Boing (http://boingboing.net), where I do a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: *lot* of word-of-mouthing. I compulsively tell friends and strangers
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: about things that I like.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: And telling people about stuff I like is *way*, *way* easier if I can
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: just send it to 'em. Way easier.

text: and movies ever released are not available for sale, anywhere in the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: world. In the brief time that P2P nets have flourished, the ad-hoc
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: masses of the Internet have managed to put just about *everything*
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: online. What's more, they've done it for cheaper than any other

text: I lived long enough to see the cure for death; to see the rise of the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Bitchun Society, to learn ten languages; to compose three symphonies; to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: realize my boyhood dream of taking up residence in Disney World; to see
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: the death of the workplace and of work.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I never thought I'd live to see the day when Keep A-Movin' Dan would
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: decide to deadhead until the heat death of the Universe.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Dan was in his second or third blush of youth when I first met him,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: sometime late-XXI. He was a rangy cowpoke, apparent 25 or so, all
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: rawhide squint-lines and sunburned neck, boots worn thin and infinitely
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: comfortable. I was in the middle of my Chem thesis, my fourth Doctorate,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: and he was taking a break from Saving the World, chilling on campus in
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Toronto and core-dumping for some poor Anthro major. We hooked up at the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Grad Students' Union -- the GSU, or Gazoo for those who knew -- on a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: busy Friday night, spring-ish. I was fighting a coral-slow battle for a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: stool at the scratched bar, inching my way closer every time the press
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: of bodies shifted, and he had one of the few seats, surrounded by a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: litter of cigarette junk and empties, clearly encamped.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Some duration into my foray, he cocked his head at me and raised a sun-
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: bleached eyebrow. "You get any closer, son, and we're going to have to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: get a pre-nup."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I was apparent forty or so, and I thought about bridling at being called
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: son, but I looked into his eyes and decided that he had enough realtime
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: that he could call me son anytime he wanted. I backed off a little and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: apologized.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: He struck a cig and blew a pungent, strong plume over the bartender's
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: head. "Don't worry about it. I'm probably a little over accustomed to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: personal space."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I couldn't remember the last time I'd heard anyone on-world talk about
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: personal space. With the mortality rate at zero and the birth-rate at
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: non-zero, the world was inexorably accreting a dense carpet of people,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: even with the migratory and deadhead drains on the population. "You've
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: been jaunting?" I asked -- his eyes were too sharp for him to have
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: missed an instant's experience to deadheading.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: He chuckled. "No sir, not me. I'm into the kind of macho shitheadery
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: that you only come across on-world. Jaunting's for play; I need work."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: The bar-glass tinkled a counterpoint.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I took a moment to conjure a HUD with his Whuffie score on it. I had to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: resize the window -- he had too many zeroes to fit on my standard
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: display. I tried to act cool, but he caught the upwards flick of my eyes
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: and then their involuntary widening. He tried a little aw-shucksery,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: gave it up and let a prideful grin show.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "I try not to pay it much mind. Some people, they get overly grateful."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: He must've seen my eyes flick up again, to pull his Whuffie history.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Wait, don't go doing that -- I'll tell you about it, you really got to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: know.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Damn, you know, it's so easy to get used to life without hyperlinks.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: You'd think you'd really miss 'em, but you don't."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: And it clicked for me. He was a missionary -- one of those fringe-
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: dwellers who act as emissary from the Bitchun Society to the benighted
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: corners of the world where, for whatever reasons, they want to die,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: starve, and choke on petrochem waste. It's amazing that these
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: communities survive more than a generation; in the Bitchun Society
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: proper, we usually outlive our detractors. The missionaries don't have
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: such a high success rate -- you have to be awfully convincing to get
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: through to a culture that's already successfully resisted nearly a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: century's worth of propaganda -- but when you convert a whole village,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: you accrue all the Whuffie they have to give. More often, missionaries
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: end up getting refreshed from a backup after they aren't heard from for
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: a decade or so. I'd never met one in the flesh before.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "How many successful missions have you had?" I asked.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Figured it out, huh? I've just come off my fifth in twenty years --
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: counterrevolutionaries hidden out in the old Cheyenne Mountain NORAD
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: site, still there a generation later." He sandpapered his whiskers with
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: his fingertips. "Their parents went to ground after their life's savings
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: vanished, and they had no use for tech any more advanced than a rifle.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Plenty of those, though."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: He spun a fascinating yarn then, how he slowly gained the acceptance of
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: the mountain-dwellers, and then their trust, and then betrayed it in
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: subtle, beneficent ways: introducing Free Energy to their greenhouses,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: then a gengineered crop or two, then curing a couple deaths, slowly
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: inching them toward the Bitchun Society, until they couldn't remember
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: why they hadn't wanted to be a part of it from the start. Now they were
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: mostly off-world, exploring toy frontiers with unlimited energy and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: unlimited supplies and deadheading through the dull times en route.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "I guess it'd be too much of a shock for them to stay on-world. They
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: think of us as the enemy, you know -- they had all kinds of plans drawn
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: up for when we invaded them and took them away; hollow suicide teeth,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: booby-traps, fall-back-and-rendezvous points for the survivors. They
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: just can't get over hating us, even though we don't even know they
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: exist. Off-world, they can pretend that they're still living rough and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: hard." He rubbed his chin again, his hard calluses grating over his

text: Gradually, the din decreased. Dan passed the mic back to Jeanine.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Hello," she said again, and flinched from the sound of her voice in the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Hall's PA. "My name is Jeanine. I'm the one who killed Julius, a year
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: ago. Dan asked me to, and I did it. I didn't ask why. I trusted -- trust
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: -- him. He told me that Julius would make a backup a few minutes before
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I shot him, and that he could get me out of the Park without getting
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: caught. I'm very sorry." There was something off-kilter about her, some
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: stilt to her stance and words that let you know she wasn't all there.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Growing up in a mountain might do that to you. I snuck a look at Lil,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: whose lips were pressed together. Growing up in a theme park might do
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: that to you, too.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Thank you, Jeanine," Dan said, taking back the mic. "You can have a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: seat now. I've said everything I need to say -- Julius and I have had
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: our own discussions in private. If there's anyone else who'd like to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: speak --"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: The words were barely out of his mouth before the crowd erupted again in
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: words and waving hands. Beside me, Jeanine flinched. I took her hand and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: shouted in her ear: "Have you ever been on the Pirates of the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Carribean?"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: She shook her head.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: her out of the Hall.

text: I booked us ringside seats at the Polynesian Luau, riding high on a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: fresh round of sympathy Whuffie, and Dan and I drank a dozen lapu-lapus
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: in hollowed-out pineapples before giving up on the idea of getting
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: drunk.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom

text: Jeanine watched the fire-dances and the torch-lighting with eyes like
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: saucers, and picked daintily at her spare ribs with one hand, never
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: averting her attention from the floor show. When they danced the fast
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: hula, her eyes jiggled. I chuckled.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: From where we sat, I could see the spot where I'd waded into the Seven
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Seas Lagoon and breathed in the blood-temp water, I could see
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Cinderella's Castle, across the lagoon, I could see the monorails and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: the ferries and the busses making their busy way through the Park,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: shuttling teeming masses of guests from place to place. Dan toasted me
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: with his pineapple and I toasted him back, drank it dry and belched in
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: satisfaction.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Full belly, good friends, and the sunset behind a troupe of tawny, half-
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: naked hula dancers. Who needs the Bitchun Society, anyway?
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: When it was over, we watched the fireworks from the beach, my toes dug
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: into the clean white sand. Dan slipped his hand into my left hand, and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Jeanine took my right. When the sky darkened and the lighted barges
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: puttered away through the night, we three sat in the hammock.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I looked out over the Seven Seas Lagoon and realized that this was my
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: last night, ever, in Walt Disney World. It was time to reboot again,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: start afresh. That's what the Park was for, only somehow, this visit,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I'd gotten stuck. Dan had unstuck me.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: The talk turned to Dan's impending death.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "So, tell me what you think of this," he said, hauling away on a glowing
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: cigarette.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Shoot," I said.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "I'm thinking -- why take lethal injection? I mean, I may be done here
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: for now, but why should I make an irreversible decision?"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Why did you want to before?" I asked.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Oh, it was the macho thing, I guess. The finality and all. But hell, I
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: don't have to prove anything, right?"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Sure," I said, magnanimously.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "So," he said, thoughtfully. "The question I'm asking is, how long can I
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: deadhead for? There are folks who go down for a thousand years, ten
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: thousand, right?"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "So, you're thinking, what, a million?" I joked.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: He laughed. "A _million_? You're thinking too small, son. Try this on
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: for size: the heat death of the universe."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "The heat death of the universe," I repeated.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Sure," he drawled, and I sensed his grin in the dark. "Ten to the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: hundred years or so. The Stelliferous Period -- it's when all the black
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: holes have run dry and things get, you know, stupendously dull. Cold,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: too. So I'm thinking -- why not leave a wake-up call for some time
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: around then?"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Sounds unpleasant to me," I said. "Brrrr."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Not at all! I figure, self-repairing nano-based canopic jar, mass
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: enough to feed it -- say, a trillion-ton asteroid -- and a lot of
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: solitude when the time comes around. I'll poke my head in every century
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: or so, just to see what's what, but if nothing really stupendous crops
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: up, I'll take the long ride out. The final frontier."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "That's pretty cool," Jeanine said.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Thanks," Dan said.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "You're not kidding, are you?" I asked.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Nope, I sure ain't," he said.

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Whuffie-penury and they started to put the Mansion back the way it was.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Tim called me to say that with enough support from Imagineering, they
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: thought they could get it up and running in a week. Suneep was ready to
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: kill someone, I swear. _A house divided against itself can_not_ stand_,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: as Mr. Lincoln used to say at the Hall of Presidents.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: I packed three changes of clothes and a toothbrush in my shoulderbag and
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: checked out of my suite at the Polynesian at ten a.m., then met Jeanine
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: and Dan at the valet parking out front. Dan had a runabout he'd picked
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: up with my Whuffie, and I piled in with Jeanine in the middle. We played
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: old Beatles tunes on the stereo all the long way to Cape Canaveral. Our
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: shuttle lifted at noon.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: The shuttle docked four hours later, but by the time we'd been through
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: decontam and orientation, it was suppertime. Dan, nearly as Whuffie-poor
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: as Debra after his confession, nevertheless treated us to a meal in the
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: big bubble, squeeze-tubes of heady booze and steaky paste, and we
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: watched the universe get colder for a while.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: There were a couple guys jamming, tethered to a guitar and a set of
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: tubs, and they weren't half bad.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Jeanine was uncomfortable hanging there naked. She'd gone to space with
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: her folks after Dan had left the mountain, but it was in a long-haul
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: generation ship. She'd abandoned it after a year or two and deadheaded
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: back to Earth in a support-pod. She'd get used to life in space after a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: while. Or she wouldn't.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Well," Dan said.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "Yup," I said, aping his laconic drawl. He smiled.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "It's that time," he said.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Spheres of saline tears formed in Jeanine's eyes, and I brushed them
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: away, setting them adrift in the bubble. I'd developed some real tender,
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: brother-sister type feelings for her since I'd watched her saucer-eye
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: her way through the Magic Kingdom. No romance -- not for me, thanks! But
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: camaraderie and a sense of responsibility.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "See you in ten to the hundred," Dan said, and headed to the airlock. I
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: started after him, but Jeanine caught my hand.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "He hates long good-byes," she said.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: "I know," I said, and watched him go.

author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: The universe gets older. So do I. So does my backup, sitting in
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: redundant distributed storage dirtside, ready for the day that space or
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: age or stupidity kills me. It recedes with the years, and I write out my
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: life longhand, a letter to the me that I'll be when it's restored into a
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: clone somewhere, somewhen. It's important that whoever I am then knows
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: about this year, and it's going to take a lot of tries for me to get it
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: right.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: In the meantime, I'm working on another symphony, one with a little bit
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: of "Grim Grinning Ghosts," and a nod to "It's a Small World After All,"
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: and especially "There's a Great Big Beautiful Tomorrow."
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: Jeanine says it's pretty good, but what does she know? She's barely
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: fifty.
title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

title: Down and Out in the Magic Kingdom
author: Doctorow, Cory

text: We've both got a lot of living to do before we know what's what.
